title.rendered: Levi & Herald Dining Set – round, square or rectangle

content.rendered:
The Levi Side Chair & Herald Dining Table indoor dining set comprises of various configurations, colours and sizes to suit your needs, style and budget.

This set is made up of our ever popular Herald Dining Table Base, Laminate Table Top & Levi Side Chair. Available in Square, Round or Rectangle as well as 2, 4 or 6 seater options.

The Levi Side Chair is made with a solid beech frame and a durable, stylish and comfortable faux leather upholstery.  The Herald Dining Table Base is made from black cast iron and is paired with a 25mm thick laminate table top, with a solid core for total integrity. 

Ideal for commercial use, such as coffee shops, hotels and care homes. Easy to clean and care for.

Purchasing this set is cheaper than purchasing the items separately. 

1 year warranty on the table, 2 year warranty on the chairs.

Dimensions:

–  Levi Side Chair: 760H x 480W x 520D x 480mm Seat Height, 7KG

– Herald Dining Base: 730mm high.

– Laminate Table Top: 25mm thick.

This item requires basic self assembly.
